name: Stunning Barn Wedding Venue
description:
DESCRIPTION
If you are planning a wedding in France and are looking for a stunning and elegant venue, then our intimate barn wedding venue, located at 1h15 fom Orly Airport is the perfect venue for you.
This former castle farm surrounded by woodland and meadows offers a barn that can seat up to 160 people and 3 houses completely restored in the interior style of the most beautiful mountain chalets. In total you will have 13 rooms for a capacity of up to 38 beds. You have exclusive use of the houses & gardens, the option to choose your own unique style of wedding, as well as your own suppliers.
If you don’t want to worry about the organisation of your beautiful day, the venues team will recommend you a list of local suppliers used to work at this venue.
You will be seduced by the stunning interiors, the luxurious accommodations, the outdoor swimming-pool, and the amazing landscape for a ceremony.
If you have any further questions then please do let us know and we would be more than happy to help.
additional_info:
FEATURES
Golf course nearby
Internet access
Disabled access
Swimming pool
Garden games
Hotel recommendation list
Marquee available on site
